author: ShortCircuit
description:
Thanks to dbrand for sponsoring our CES 2026 coverage. Buy some stickers or whatever at: https://www.mysponsorkeepsdroppingout.com

Hisense is showcasing some new TVs here at CES 2026 including an updated refresh to their 116" TV from last year. The new 116UXS has RGB LED EVO adds cyan to the MiniLEDs, supposedly resulting in more lifelike colours. Is that true? Well you'll just have to watch and decide yourself.
